description: Tuna tataki is the perfect way to enjoy seared tuna and is packed with Japanese flavour.
keywords: Fish dishes,Fish,Low saturated fat,High protein,Egg free,Low sugar
name: Tuna Tataki Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the sesame seeds out on a plate. Brush the tuna loin all over with sesame oil and sear all over in a hot pan for about 40 seconds.
Remove from the pan and brush lightly with mustard. Roll the tuna in sesame seeds to coat. Wrap with clingfilm and chill in the fridge for 20 minutes.
Whisk the soy sauce, lime juice and juice from the pickled ginger together in a small bowl.
Slice the tuna into 1/2cm thick slices, scatter with rocket and pickled ginger, drizzle over dressing and serve.
